Description:
Deadfall Adventures - Adventure FPS, which is set in 1938. Players will play the role of the traveler James Lee Quatermain accompanying U.S. agent , Jennifer Goodwin, in the Egyptian temple in search of an ancient artifact "Heart of Atlantis ". But it is not just the Americans had their eye on the artifact - the German occultists of Ahnenerbe also want to get it . Persecuted by the Nazis, James will visit different parts of the world, from the deserts of Egypt and the icy Arctic to the jungles of Guatemala.
